entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Key Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:22 PM CST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -25.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Key Lake Airport 5:58 PM CST Saturday 28 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -25.6°C

Visibility: 3.6 km
Humidity: 72 %
Wind Chill: -38
Dewpoint: -29.1°C
Wind: WNW 21 km/h gust 33 km/h

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 31. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 31. Wind chill minus 39 this evening and minus 46 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 24.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near noon. High minus 24. Wind chill minus 44 in the morning and minus 34 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 28 January 2023
